ygData.subject: Re: Mesmerize
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The mixing the hate list is from the stratics spell list. Maybe mesmerize is actually broken (in a good way for us) and does too much? Now I m confused
ygData.messageBody:
>From: Ben Setala <onlyanembryo@...>
>Absolutely incorrect. It ERASES the hate list and I
>can prove it, on any mob. Don't know where you got
>that mixing thing from.

The mixing the hate list is from the stratics spell list.

Maybe mesmerize is actually broken (in a good way for us) and does too much?

Now I'm confused about what memory blur is supposed to do. So is it just a
higher
level mesmerize without the stun?

The stratics spell list says the NPC forgets about player. So does this mean
mesmerize is actually better than blur - except its a lower level spell?

Azboklin the enchanter
